comments.body: Fyi @kenzieschmoll @grouma is it intentional that we aren't surfacing DevTools on the web with Flutter Tools?

I have a PR on a local branch that will do this, but I was hesitant to turn this on until the error that is thrown as soon as you open DevTools is fixed (https://github.com/flutter/devtools/issues/2627). It seems like a bad experience to start pointing flutter web users to DevTools if they are going to be greeted by a bug.
Lets land a workaround for 2627 today by skipping the LayoutExplorer on Flutter Web until eval on Flutter web resolves the bug evaluating that expression.
As far as I am aware this PR is orthogonal to the Web issue.
